content: Hello: We are preparing to participate CDS Hooks track for the coming Connectathon 12. I would like to know how we could start the works since we didn't attend this track before.

Some background information: We have created a SMART for FHIR app on SmartHealthIT for both gallery launch and stand alone launch. We half way connecting the same app to Epic. I have some basic ideas about how CDS Hooks works. I would like to see any sample codes that could help us to update the same app to CDS Hooks.
For a simple example of a CDS Hook, see https://github.com/jawalonoski/bmi-cds-hook from @Jason Walonoski .
The basics of the API are documented at https://github.com/cds-hooks/cds-hooks/wiki
Our connectathon track is written up at http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201605_CDS_Hooks_Connectathon_Track_Proposal
@Kevin Shekleton and I are still looking at some API simplifications, and we hope to have these documented shortly (otherwise, we'll stick with the existing API).
